history.proof: intros. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: ex_lim_seq_ext_loc, is_lim_seq_subseq, eventually_subseq_loc.

exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_seq_subseq with (phi := phi) in H2.
apply ex_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u) (v := fun n => u (phi n)) in H2.

original: intros u phi H1 H2. apply is_lim_seq_subseq with (phi := phi) in H2. apply ex_lim_seq_ext_loc with (u := u) (v := fun n => u (phi n)) in H2. - apply H2. - apply eventually_subseq_loc. apply H1.
